title: 这件衣服质量特别好

conversations.english: Good morning. What can I do for you, sir?早上好！先生，您需要什么？
conversations.chinese: 早上好！先生，您需要什么？
conversations.reply_english: I'd like to see some coats. Would you recommend me some of them?我想看看上衣，你能推荐一些给我吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 我想看看上衣，你能推荐一些给我吗？

title: 买唐装旗袍Buying a China-gown of Tang-Dynasty style

conversations.english: That China-gown of Tang-Dynasty style is so beautiful. Would you show it to　me, please?那件唐装旗袍太漂亮了。请给我看看好吗？
conversations.chinese: 那件唐装旗袍太漂亮了。请给我看看好吗？
conversations.reply_english: Absolutely. Here it is.当然可以，给您看吧。
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然可以，给您看吧。

title: 我想买一件夹克衫 I’m looking for a new jacket

conversations.english: Good morning, madam. Can I help you?早上好 我能帮你吗？
conversations.chinese: 早上好 我能帮你吗？
conversations.reply_english: Good morning. I’m looking for a new jacket.早上好，我想买一件夹克衫。
conversations.reply_chinese: 早上好，我想买一件夹克衫。

title: 我想给儿子挑选一件毛衣I'd like to choose a sweater for my son

conversations.english: Can I help you, madam?有什么可以为您效劳的，夫人？
conversations.chinese: 有什么可以为您效劳的，夫人？
conversations.reply_english: Yes. I'd like to choose a sweater for my son.是的，我想给我的儿子挑选一件毛衣。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我想给我的儿子挑选一件毛衣。

title: 为了下周那个重要的采访我得买身新衣服

conversations.english: Hello ,sir, what can I do for you today?先生，您好，需要点什么？
conversations.chinese: 先生，您好，需要点什么？
conversations.reply_english: Hello, I need a new suit. I have an important interview next week, so I really need to look sharp.你好，我需要买套新衣服。下周我有个重要的采访，所以我得看起来很有型。
conversations.reply_chinese: 你好，我需要买套新衣服。下周我有个重要的采访，所以我得看起来很有型。

title: 真不敢相信这几条裙子可真便宜啊

conversations.english: I can’t believe these skirts are so cheap.我不敢相信这些裙子居然这么便宜。
conversations.chinese: 我不敢相信这些裙子居然这么便宜。
conversations.reply_english: I know and they are really nice, too.对啊，而且真的很好看。
conversations.reply_chinese: 对啊，而且真的很好看。

title: 您的这张visa卡显示此卡无效

conversations.english: Good afternoon, miss, can I help you?下午好，小姐，可以为您效劳吗？
conversations.chinese: 下午好，小姐，可以为您效劳吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I’d like to buy this dress, please.好的，我想买这件衣服。
conversations.reply_chinese: 好的，我想买这件衣服。

title: 我想买一件毛衣给我的丈夫

conversations.english: Can I help you,Madam?太太，我可以帮您吗？
conversations.chinese: 太太，我可以帮您吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes. I'd like to buy a sweater for my husband. Which style is the latest?是的。我想买一件毛衣给我的丈夫。什么款式是最新的？
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的。我想买一件毛衣给我的丈夫。什么款式是最新的？

title: 你们有这种只有一个胸兜的款式吗

conversations.english: Do you have this design with only one breast pocket?你们有这种只有一个胸兜的款式吗？
conversations.chinese: 你们有这种只有一个胸兜的款式吗？
conversations.reply_english: Let me see.Oh,we have the design but not the same color as this one.让我找一找。呀，有这种式样，但颜色不一样。
conversations.reply_chinese: 让我找一找。呀，有这种式样，但颜色不一样。

title: 您喜欢哪个品牌的男士西服

conversations.english: We have a great variety of men's suits,sir.Which particular brand do you prefer?先生，男式西服我们有很多种。你喜欢那种品牌。
conversations.chinese: 先生，男式西服我们有很多种。你喜欢那种品牌。
conversations.reply_english: Pierre Cardin.皮尔卡丹
conversations.reply_chinese: 皮尔卡丹

title: 我得把这件领口脱线的毛衣退掉

conversations.english: I'm afraid I have to return this sweater.恐怕我得把这件毛衣退掉。
conversations.chinese: 恐怕我得把这件毛衣退掉。
conversations.reply_english: May I ask if there's anything wrong with it?请问毛衣有什么毛病吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 请问毛衣有什么毛病吗？

title: 你还有更便宜的衣服吗

conversations.english: How do you like this one?It's nice and cheap It's only thirty-four dollars.您觉得这件怎么样?又好又便宜。只要三十四美元.
conversations.chinese: 您觉得这件怎么样?又好又便宜。只要三十四美元.
conversations.reply_english: Have you got anything cheaper?你有更便宜的吗?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你有更便宜的吗?

title: 麻布是夏天最理想的衣服布料了

conversations.english: What's it made of,could you tell me?你能告诉我这是什么料子吗？
conversations.chinese: 你能告诉我这是什么料子吗？
conversations.reply_english: Linen.It's ideal for summer wear.麻布，夏天穿最理想了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 麻布，夏天穿最理想了。

title: 这衣服非常漂亮That dress is very pretty

conversations.english: That dress is very pretty. Why don’t you like it?这衣服非常漂亮，你为什么不喜欢？
conversations.chinese: 这衣服非常漂亮，你为什么不喜欢？
conversations.reply_english: It’s too loud.它太花俏了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 它太花俏了。

title: 这种布料不仅耐洗而且不缩水 Stand washing

conversations.english: Does the material stand washing?这种布料耐洗吗？
conversations.chinese: 这种布料耐洗吗？
conversations.reply_english: Sure.This material is not only washable but also unshrinkable,sun-resistant,crease-resistant,resilient.不仅耐洗，而且不缩水、不怕晒、不起皱、有弹性。
conversations.reply_chinese: 不仅耐洗，而且不缩水、不怕晒、不起皱、有弹性。

title: 给你买几件夏天穿的衬衫吧

conversations.english: Why don't we get you some shirts?给你买几件衬衫吧。
conversations.chinese: 给你买几件衬衫吧。
conversations.reply_english: I want to leave. We've already been here two hours.我想走了，我们已经在这里逛了两个小时。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我想走了，我们已经在这里逛了两个小时。

title: 这件漂亮的衣服可真贵啊

conversations.english: That dress is too expensive.这衣服真贵。
conversations.chinese: 这衣服真贵。
conversations.reply_english: But it’s so pretty.但是很漂亮呀.
conversations.reply_chinese: 但是很漂亮呀.

title: 这条围巾能便宜一点儿卖吗

conversations.english: Hi, are you being helped?嘿，有人为你服务吗？
conversations.chinese: 嘿，有人为你服务吗？
conversations.reply_english: No, I'm not. I am interested in some scarves.不，我没有。我对围巾感兴趣。
conversations.reply_chinese: 不，我没有。我对围巾感兴趣。

title: 我想买齐彩虹颜色的所有衣服

conversations.english: Look at the catalogue,John. I think I want to get this red blouse看这本目录，我想买这件红色的衬衫。
conversations.chinese: 看这本目录，我想买这件红色的衬衫。
conversations.reply_english: Don't you have one like this in blue?你不是有一件蓝色的跟这件相似？
conversations.reply_chinese: 你不是有一件蓝色的跟这件相似？

title: 那你觉得我的新衣服怎么样

conversations.english: So what do you think of my new dress?那你觉得我的新衣服怎么样？
conversations.chinese: 那你觉得我的新衣服怎么样？
conversations.reply_english: I think it’s great! I really like the color, and it goes really well with your eyes. I’ve actually been eyeing that dress at Maxine’s for a while now, but I wasn’t sure I could afford ninety-five dollars for a dress at the moment.我认为非常好！我很喜欢这个颜色，和你的眼睛很相配。我已经注意麦克辛服装店的那件衣服一段时间了，但当时我不敢肯定我能付得起95美元买件衣服。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我认为非常好！我很喜欢这个颜色，和你的眼睛很相配。我已经注意麦克辛服装店的那件衣服一段时间了，但当时我不敢肯定我能付得起95美元买件衣服。

title: 这几件睡衣我全买了 I'll take it all

conversations.english: Didn't you say your friend was American? Where is she going on her honeymoon?您不是说您的朋友是美国人吗？她要去哪里度蜜月？
conversations.chinese: 您不是说您的朋友是美国人吗？她要去哪里度蜜月？
conversations.reply_english: They're going skiing in Colorado.他们要去科罗拉多州滑雪。
conversations.reply_chinese: 他们要去科罗拉多州滑雪。

title: 我想买件丝绸的唐装外套

conversations.english: good afternoon! Can I help you?下午好!您要买什么?
conversations.chinese: 下午好!您要买什么?
conversations.reply_english: could you show me where the Chinese-style clothing is located? I want to buy a silk coat.唐装在哪儿?我想买件丝绸外套.
conversations.reply_chinese: 唐装在哪儿?我想买件丝绸外套.

title: 好看的衣服价格也是很贵的

conversations.english: Oh,the clothes here are so expensive! No wonder there are few people.哇,这儿的衣服真贵!难怪没什么人!
conversations.chinese: 哇,这儿的衣服真贵!难怪没什么人!
conversations.reply_english: Beauty costs, dear! What do you think of this dress? Do you think it suits me?亲爱的,美丽是要付出代价的.你觉得这条裙子怎么样,适合我吗?
conversations.reply_chinese: 亲爱的,美丽是要付出代价的.你觉得这条裙子怎么样,适合我吗?

title: 我想为我的未婚妻挑一身冬装

conversations.english: Hello! Can I help you?你好！我可以帮你吗？
conversations.chinese: 你好！我可以帮你吗？
conversations.reply_english: Well, I am looking for some winter clothes for my fiancee.额，我要给我的未婚妻买一些冬衣。
conversations.reply_chinese: 额，我要给我的未婚妻买一些冬衣。

title: 这衣服穿在你的身上显得很优雅

conversations.english: That looks graceful on you.这衣服穿在你的身上很优雅
conversations.chinese: 这衣服穿在你的身上很优雅
conversations.reply_english: Thank you.But it is too bright for me.谢谢你！这颜色对我来说太鲜艳了
conversations.reply_chinese: 谢谢你！这颜色对我来说太鲜艳了

title: 这件衣服要多久能改好呢

conversations.english: I would like to have a custom-made skirt.我想定做一条裙子。
conversations.chinese: 我想定做一条裙子。
conversations.reply_english: May I take your size?我可以量你的尺寸吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 我可以量你的尺寸吗？

title: 定做一件大衣的话多久能做好

conversations.english: Well, I’d like to have my coat to order.Will you take my measurements?我想定做一件大衣。你能帮我量一下尺寸吗？
conversations.chinese: 我想定做一件大衣。你能帮我量一下尺寸吗？
conversations.reply_english: Certainly.How do you like to have it made?当然可以。你想做什么样的款式？
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然可以。你想做什么样的款式？

title: 你穿这件衣服看上去真是太棒了

conversations.english: I like double-breasted garment with no belt.Could you show me some?我喜欢双排扣没腰带的大衣，给我拿几件看看好吗？
conversations.chinese: 我喜欢双排扣没腰带的大衣，给我拿几件看看好吗？
conversations.reply_english: Here you are.Which size do you wear?请看吧，穿多大号的？
conversations.reply_chinese: 请看吧，穿多大号的？

title: 这件衬衫能便宜点儿卖吗

conversations.english: I like this shirt.How much is it?我喜欢这件衬衫，多少钱?
conversations.chinese: 我喜欢这件衬衫，多少钱?

title: 我们的促销活动十分实惠

conversations.english: Actually, you can take advantage of our "New Millennium Woman" promotion.其实你可以利用我们的“千禧年新女性”促销活动。
conversations.chinese: 其实你可以利用我们的“千禧年新女性”促销活动。
conversations.reply_english: Does that include some kind of "Love, Amy Card"?那有包括什么“爱咪之爱卡”之类的吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 那有包括什么“爱咪之爱卡”之类的吗？

title: 消费满万元即免费送泰迪熊

conversations.english: So that will be one teddy, two terry cloth robes, three pairs of satin slippers, and two pairs of pajamas.那么总共是一件连身内衣，两件毛巾布睡袍，三双缎质拖鞋，还有两件睡衣。
conversations.chinese: 那么总共是一件连身内衣，两件毛巾布睡袍，三双缎质拖鞋，还有两件睡衣。
conversations.reply_english: Does all that come to 10,000NT?这样加起来要一万台币吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 这样加起来要一万台币吗？

title: 人们为何喜欢这些又花俏又贵的内衣

conversations.english: Um, hello again. Are you sure you don't want to make a purchase, sir?呣，又见面了。您确定不买东西吗？
conversations.chinese: 呣，又见面了。您确定不买东西吗？
conversations.reply_english: I have a question.我有个问题.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我有个问题.

title: 我的九分裤是量体裁衣

conversations.english: Besides, yours don't have side pockets like mine.此外，你的裤子不像我的有侧边口袋。
conversations.chinese: 此外，你的裤子不像我的有侧边口袋。
conversations.reply_english: Cool! They're big! What have you got in there?酷耶！口袋真大！你在里面放了什么？
conversations.reply_chinese: 酷耶！口袋真大！你在里面放了什么？

title: 现在我们给你量下尺寸如何 Custom-made suit

conversations.english: Welcome to Bill’s Fabric World. What can I do for you today?欢迎来到比尔布世界。今天您想要点什么？
conversations.chinese: 欢迎来到比尔布世界。今天您想要点什么？
conversations.reply_english: I was wondering if you guys also tailor clothes?我在想你们是否也做衣服。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我在想你们是否也做衣服。

title: 选购时尚名品 Choosing Cloth

conversations.english: Good morning, can I help you?早上好，我能为您做点什么？
conversations.chinese: 早上好，我能为您做点什么？
conversations.reply_english: No, thanks. We are just looking around.不，谢谢。我们只是看看。
conversations.reply_chinese: 不，谢谢。我们只是看看。

title: 您定做的衣服想用什么料子?

conversations.english: I’d like to be fitted for a suit please.我想要做一件外套。
conversations.chinese: 我想要做一件外套。
conversations.reply_english: Certainly. Have you decided which material you would like the suit to be made from? We have a selection of materials over here.当然。你想要什么料子的？我们这人有几种选择。
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然。你想要什么料子的？我们这人有几种选择。

title: 你这里有足球袜和运动袜吗

conversations.english: Can I help you?我能为你效劳吗？
conversations.chinese: 我能为你效劳吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes.Do you have football stockings here?你这里有足球袜吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 你这里有足球袜吗？

title: 我喜欢这件衣服的款式

conversations.english: I like the design of the coat.我喜欢这件衣服的款式.
conversations.chinese: 我喜欢这件衣服的款式.
conversations.reply_english: But I like its color.我看好了它的颜色.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我看好了它的颜色.

title: 你能向我推荐一些西装品牌吗

conversations.english: I want a suit of workmanship and suitable for formal meetings.Would you recommend some brands?我想要一套做工好，适合参加正式会议的西装。推荐一下牌子吧?
conversations.chinese: 我想要一套做工好，适合参加正式会议的西装。推荐一下牌子吧?
conversations.reply_english: How about these famous brands?Such as pierre Cardin...这些名牌怎么样？比如皮尔卡丹啦……
conversations.reply_chinese: 这些名牌怎么样？比如皮尔卡丹啦……

title: 我只是进来随便逛逛 Browsing

conversations.english: Hello, sir. Is there anything I can help you find?您好。我能帮您找什么东西吗？
conversations.chinese: 您好。我能帮您找什么东西吗？
conversations.reply_english: Um...Uh...I'm just looking, thanks.呃……我只是随便看看，多谢。
conversations.reply_chinese: 呃……我只是随便看看，多谢。

title: 办卡后您能享受8折优惠

conversations.english: I'm sorry to make you wait. What did you decide?很抱歉让您久等了。您选了什么？
conversations.chinese: 很抱歉让您久等了。您选了什么？
conversations.reply_english: Well, I wasn't planning on spending that much money today, so...呃，我没打算今天花那么多钱，所以……
conversations.reply_chinese: 呃，我没打算今天花那么多钱，所以……

title: 你试穿的这件衬衣很好看

conversations.english: I want to go try on these clothes.我想试穿这些衣服。
conversations.chinese: 我想试穿这些衣服。
conversations.reply_english: What did you find?你发现了什么？
conversations.reply_chinese: 你发现了什么？

title: 你想知道我是在哪里找到这些的吗

conversations.english: Hey, what are you doing here?嘿，你在这儿做什么？
conversations.chinese: 嘿，你在这儿做什么？
conversations.reply_english: I'm just shopping.我只是在购物。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我只是在购物。

title: 我穿上这件衣服像不像辣妹啊

conversations.english: I'd like to try this on, please. Where is the fitting room?我想试试这件。试衣间在哪儿？
conversations.chinese: 我想试试这件。试衣间在哪儿？
conversations.reply_english: This way, please.请这边走。
conversations.reply_chinese: 请这边走。

title: 上一季的许多名品正在打折呢

conversations.english: I need some new clothes for the coming season. Where shall I go to pick up some?我需要为下个季节买一些新衣服。我该去哪里买呢？
conversations.chinese: 我需要为下个季节买一些新衣服。我该去哪里买呢？
conversations.reply_english: I'm thinking of buying some stuff, too. Let's go to the speciality stores. There will be some new models for sale now.我也在考虑买一些衣服呢。我们去专卖店吧。现在那里该有新款上市了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我也在考虑买一些衣服呢。我们去专卖店吧。现在那里该有新款上市了。

title: 我带你去商场更换个大号的衣服吧

conversations.english: Come in and have some coffee, Anna. The kids have just gone out to the mall to hang out with their friends.安娜，进来喝杯咖啡。孩子们刚出去和他们的朋友们逛购物中心。
conversations.chinese: 安娜，进来喝杯咖啡。孩子们刚出去和他们的朋友们逛购物中心。
conversations.reply_english: I saw a lot of teenagers when Alan and I were there yesterday.昨天我和艾伦在那里的时候看到很多青少年。
conversations.reply_chinese: 昨天我和艾伦在那里的时候看到很多青少年。

title: 这件衣服和你眼睛的颜色很相配

conversations.english: So what do you think of my new dress?那你觉得我的新衣服怎么样？
conversations.chinese: 那你觉得我的新衣服怎么样？
conversations.reply_english: I think it's great! I really like the color, and it goes really well with your eyes. I've actually been eyeing that dress at Maxine's for a while now, but I wasn't sure I could afford ninety-five dollars for a dress at the moment.我认为非常好！我很喜欢这个颜色，和你的眼睛很相配。我已经注意麦克辛服装店的那件衣服一段时间了，但当时我不敢肯定我能付得起95美元买件衣服。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我认为非常好！我很喜欢这个颜色，和你的眼睛很相配。我已经注意麦克辛服装店的那件衣服一段时间了，但当时我不敢肯定我能付得起95美元买件衣服。
